title: Reservations and E-Commerce
description: Unlocked a new digital sales channel by introducing reservations, full online purchasing, and a Past Editions storefront. Led product strategy and implementation that now drives 15% of annual U.S. motorcycle revenue.

title: Unified Lead and Dealer Locator System
description: Improved lead quality, sped up the customer path to purchase, and strengthened dealer engagement by unifying five fragmented lead sources and launching a real-time Dealer Locator. Increased routing accuracy to 97.7% and reduced manual workload for Sales.

title: Dash Prototype: Future Interaction Model
description: Defined the early product direction for Zero’s next-generation dash through competitive research, concept development, and a 20-participant usability study that identified a faster and more intuitive navigation model for future motorcycles.

title: Stories: CMS-Driven Storytelling Platform
description: Built a scalable storytelling platform that strengthened brand authority and organic visibility. Enabled the team to publish independently and delivered significant gains in engagement and SEO performance.

title: Full Website Rebuild
description: Scoped, planned, and co-developed Zero’s new global website on Next.js with improved performance and a modern design system. Reduced build times by more than 80% and created a durable foundation still powering the site years later.

title: Events Management System
description: Improved event discoverability and reduced host friction by creating a unified events system with self-serve dealer submissions, structured admin tools, and a modern public discovery experience. Enabled faster publishing and supported thousands of global demo tour registrations.
